room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Mummy" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
room_description:
You are part of an archaeological excavation of a CURSED Egyptian tomb.  Some archaeologists have already disappeared!  Traps have sealed your fate, doors have closed and you are doomed - unless you can solve the ancient codes, riddles and puzzles.

Can you and your friends escape from an ancient Mummy's tomb cursed by the stings of a thousand scorpions?
